hero.title: Your Gateway to Japanese Education
hero.subtitle: Golkahikari Educational Consultancy
hero.motto: Bridging Dreams Between Nepal and Japan
hero.description: Expert guidance for Japanese college applications and study visa processing

about.title: About Golkahikari Educational Consultancy
about.content: We are Nepal's newest educational consultancy specializing in Japanese higher education. Founded by experienced professionals with deep understanding of both Nepali and Japanese educational systems, we are committed to guiding students through every step of their journey to study in Japan. Our fresh approach combines traditional values with modern methodologies to ensure the best outcomes for our students.

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.content: To become the most trusted bridge between Nepali students and Japanese educational institutions, fostering cultural exchange and academic excellence. We envision creating a new standard in educational consultancy where every student receives personalized attention and comprehensive support. Our goal is to build lasting relationships and establish ourselves as the premier choice for Japanese education guidance in Nepal.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.content: To provide exceptional, personalized guidance to Nepali students seeking quality education in Japan. We are committed to maintaining the highest standards of service, transparency, and ethical practices from day one. Our mission is to ensure every student we serve achieves their educational dreams while building our reputation as Nepal's most reliable educational consultancy for Japanese studies.

visa.title: Visa Processing
visa.description: Complete assistance with student visa applications and documentation

counseling.title: Educational Counseling
counseling.description: Personalized guidance for choosing the right Japanese institution

application.title: Application Support
application.description: End-to-end support for college and university applications

language.title: Language Preparation
language.description: Japanese language training and JLPT preparation guidance

team.title: Meet Our Team
team.subtitle: Dedicated professionals committed to your success in Japanese education

study.title: Essential Study Materials
study.subtitle: Carefully curated resources for Nepali students preparing for Japanese education

guarantee.title: Our Promise
guarantee.content: As a newly established consultancy, we promise to give each student our complete attention and dedication. We guarantee transparent processes, honest guidance, and unwavering support throughout your educational journey. Your success is our success, and we are committed to building our reputation through your achievements.
